Description:

Remake of the classic 1997 shooter from 3D Realms, created an independent development studio Flying Wild Hog. Shadow Warrior - is the story of Lena Chi , mercenary corporation " Zilla Enterprises ", who was ordered to get a mysterious sword Nobitsura Kage , granting unlimited power . Learning that unusual blade belongs to ancient gods from another reality , their true intentions and terrible Chi Len becomes reluctant hero . Blades and guns, magic and otherworldly own wits to help him to expose those who are behind the invasion of demons in our world , and send evil back into the darkness .

Features Repack: 

Version of the game - v 1.1.2
Do not cut / recoded

Additions:

- Classic Shadow Warrior Katana
- Zilla Prototype Katana
- Serious Sam 3 Sledgehammer
- Hotline Miami Katana
- Saints Row 4 Penetrator
- The Walking Dead Ice
- Rise of the Triad Excalibat
